description: Update a job production plan alarm

flags.name: --tons
flags.validation: Must be a number greater than 0 if provided and not empty.

flags.description: Base material type fully qualified name
flags.name: --base-material-type-fully-qualified-name
--max-latency-minutes
flags.validation: Must be an integer greater than 0 if provided and not empty.

side_effects: Updates a job production plan alarm.
validation_notes: Requires an alarm ID argument. At least one updatable field must be provided. If provided, --tons must be a number greater than 0 and cannot be empty. If provided, --max-latency-minutes must be an integer greater than 0 and cannot be empty.
